input.sentences: we went to a horse farm today .
their lashes are very long and full .
before long | the horses went to graze .
our time at the farm is up | but we will be back in the future .
output.sentences: The farm has two horses on it.
The beautiful horses are a matched set.
Each of the horses have long eyelashes and a beautiful brown coat.
Other horses graze on grass in a pasture.
Perhaps in the future there will be another time we can visit the farm.
